original: @20b # // rgya gar skad du /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: gzhi lam 'bras bu bsgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba /

original: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi ni //

original: nyam chung nyon cig bshad par bya //
analyzed: nyam chung nyon cig bshad par bya //

original: lte ba sbrul pa'i 'khor lo nas //
analyzed: lte ba sbrul pa'i 'khor lo nas //

original: sna bu ka gnyis dang tshangs pa'i bar //
analyzed: sna bu ka gnyis dang tshangs pa'i bar //

original: g-yon gyi dkar dang g-yas rtsa dmar //
analyzed: g-yon gyi dkar dang g-yas rtsa dmar //

original: gdul bya btul nas slar yang thim //

original: yi ge gsum gyi zla tshes la //
